attributes.action: Stop Munira, A Four-Year-Old Girl With Down's Syndrome, Being Moved From Her School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Munira, a four-year-old girl with Down's syndrome, has just started school. She loves every minute of it. 

Munira faces the real and daily risk of being moved with her parents to another part of the UK without warning. 

Munira and her family have already been moved without warning on a number of occasions. 

Please sign this petition to ensure that Munira continues to enjoy her current school and that she grows up in a safe and secure environment.

Thank you

Information Office
Down's Syndrome Association (UK)
Website: www.downs-syndrome.org.uk

rejection.details: As an individual case, this is a matter for direct communications with the Department for Children, Schools and Families.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
